title: Blueprints for Healthy Development Fund
description: To provide support for services, salaries, and operating funds for the Blueprints for Healthy Development Program in the Institute of Behavioral Science at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent:
Donations support an online registry of evidence-based interventions that are effective in reducing antisocial behavior and promoting a healthy course of youth development and adult maturity.

Blueprints is housed within the Institute of Behavioral Science at the University of Colorado Boulder and serves as a resource for governmental agencies, foundations, community organizations and individuals seeking to make informed decisions about their investments in preventive interventions.
